oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A new and simple synthetic approach to functionalized sulphone derivatives by the Suzuki-Miyaura cross-coupling reaction
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KOTHA, S
GHOSH, AK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: amino-acid derivatives
ring-closing metathesis
diels-alder approach
9,10-diarylanthracene derivatives
dibenzylglycine derivatives
phenylalanine peptides
cyclic sulfones
spare mmp-1/
inhibitors
chemistry
sulphones
suzuki-miyaura reaction
crosscoupling
rongalite
sultine
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: synthesis of various highly functionalized sulphone derivatives are reported via the bis Suzuki-Miyaura (SM) cross-coupling reaction as a key step. In this regard, the dibromo sulphone 8, prepared from the corresponding sultine derivative 7 by thermal rearrangement has been used as a key building block to prepare various highly functionalized aromatic sulphone derivatives.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: INDIAN JOURNAL OF CHEMISTRY SECTION B-ORGANIC CHEMISTRY INCLUDING MEDICINAL CHEMISTRY, 45(1), 227-231
